text: Christopher Raphael Deluzio (born July 13, 1984) is an American attorney, politician, and former U.S. Navy officer. He has been the U.S. representative for Pennsylvania's 17th congressional district since 2023. He is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Chris Deluzio official U.S. House website * Chris Deluzio for Congress campaign website * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Lawyers from Pittsburgh Category:Politicians from Pittsburgh Category:Military people from Pennsylvania Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Chris Deluzio
